name: autohidpi
title: AutoHiDPI
description: Automatically enable and disable HiDPI (a.k.a. Retina) mode (layout.css.devPixelsPerPx) for multiple monitor setups.
author: Ertug Karamatli

preferences.name: screenWidth
preferences.title: HiDPI Screen Width (Pixels)
preferences.description: HiDPI mode is enabled when active screen width is at least this value. For example, if you have one Retina monitor (2880x1800) and one HD monitor (1920x1080), you should enter 2880.

preferences.name: pixelRatioStr
preferences.title: Pixel Ratio
preferences.description: Enter the pixel ratio to use when HiDPI mode is enabled. For example, you can try 1.25, 1.5, 1.75, 2 etc.
